definition: Yima county level city in Sanmenxia 三門峽|三门峡[San1 men2 xia2], Henan
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: The bulk of the railroad workers voted to go back to work.
sentences.chinese: 大多數鐵路工人投票義馬市竊聽器同意規復事變。
